header.title: Topic Preview
header.description: Topic Preview displays a short excerpt of text from the first post in a tooltip while the mouse hovers over a topicâ€™s title. Settings in the ACP allow you to adjust the amount of text shown, to use native browser tooltips or a pretty jQuery theme with options to also show user's avatars, and both the first and last posts from the topic. Topic Preview is customizable to get the right look for each style in your board. (Note: This MOD was inspired by a similar MOD by RMcGirr83.)
header.author-notes: Styling / Behavior options: You can change the appearance and behavior of the "jQuery Topic Preview" theme for each style installed on your board. Search in your styles overall_footer.html file for .topicPreview and you will find available settings for: Themes, Width, Hover Delay Time and Position adjustment.

changelog.change: Fixed a critical bug that could cause a fatal error/blank page when stripping out BBCodes of a very large post that also contains brackets in the text
Smarter and more efficient post text trimming
Fix an issue where content between multiple magic URLs could be removed from the preview

Added an ACP option to also display the last post text (only in the new jQuery Topic Preview theme)

Added an ACP option to define BBcodes whose content you want removed from Topic Preview. This is good for spoiler or hidden text BBcodes, Youtube BBcodes, or if you find any other BBcodes causing undesirable effects in the Topic Preview

<!-- IF S_JQUERY_TOPIC_PREVIEW -->
	<script type="text/javascript">
		window.jQuery || document.write(unescape('%3Cscript src="{ROOT_PATH}styles/topic_preview_assets/jquery.min.js" type="text/javascript"%3E%3C/script%3E'));
	</script>
	<script src="{ROOT_PATH}styles/topic_preview_assets/topic_preview.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript">
		jQuery(function(){
			jQuery("dt[title]").topicPreview({
				"dir"   : "{S_CONTENT_DIRECTION}", // do not change
				"theme" : "light", // use "light" or "dark" topic preview theme
				"delay" : 1500, // sets the delay before showing topic previews (in milliseconds)
				"width" : 360, // sets the width of topic previews (in pixels)
				"left"  : 35, // sets the position offset from the left (in pixels)
				"drift" : 15, // sets the amount of vertical animation, use negative values to change direction (in pixels)
				"noavatar" : "{ROOT_PATH}styles/topic_preview_assets/no_avatar.png"
			});
		});
	</script>
<!-- ENDIF -->
